attributes.action: Allow the use of historical propliner aircraft for passenger pleasure flights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of Douglas DC-3 and Douglas DC-6 type of aircraft carrying passengers has been stopped due to "security" issues. ie; Cost of instigating cockpit security measures such as cockpit locks etc.
Why should air enthusiats who love the aircraft to fly be stopped from being able to continue their hobby.
